```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(magrittr)
library(dplyr)  
```

```{r}
getwd()
EV_data <- read.csv("./Data/data_ZEV_asthmaED_2013_2022.csv")
```

```{r}
#Median income 2013

EV_data_2013 <- EV_data %>%
  filter(yr == 2013)

model_2013 <- lm(Age_Adjusted_Rate_of_Asthma_ED_Visit_Rate ~ HHincomeMedian, data = EV_data_2013)
summary(model_2013)
```


```{r}
#Median income 2022
EV_data_2022 <- EV_data %>%
  filter(yr == 2022)

model_2022 <- lm(Age_Adjusted_Rate_of_Asthma_ED_Visit_Rate ~ HHincomeMedian, data = EV_data_2022)
summary(model_2022)

```

```{r}
EV_subset <- EV_data %>%
  filter(yr %in% c(2013, 2022))

ggplot(EV_subset, aes(x = HHincomeMedian,
                      y = Age_Adjusted_Rate_of_Asthma_ED_Visit_Rate,
                      color = factor(yr))) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.6) +
  geom_smooth(method = "glm", se = TRUE) +
  labs(title = "Asthma ED Visit Rate vs Median Income (2013 & 2022)",
       x = "Median Household Income",
       y = "Asthma ED Visit Rate",
       color = "Year") +
  theme_minimal()
```
